T02D1801:42b-1: bo dhi tsi tta bi ba ra na /
T02D1801:42b-5: de nas byang chub kyi sems sgom pa'i 'grel pa bshad par bya'o //
T02D1801:42b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad sems kyis rnam
T02D1801:42b-7: par brtags pa'o zhes gsungs pas re zhig sems ni
T02D1801:42b-8: de nyid kyi rang bzhin ci zhig ces nges par
T02D1801:42b-9: rtog pa na / dngos po thams cad dang bral ba //
T02D1801:42b-10: phung po khams dang skye mched dang //
T02D1801:42b-11: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs //
T02D1801:42b-12: chos bdag med par mnyam nyid pas //
T02D1801:42b-13: rang sems gdod nas ma skyes pa //
T02D1801:42b-14: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1801:42b-16: smras pa 'di yi don ci yin zhe na /
T02D1801:42b-18: dngos po thams cad dang bral ba //
T02D1801:42b-19: zhes te dngos po'i sgras bdag la sogs pa mngon par brjod do //
T02D1801:43a-0: @43a * // 'di skad du sems de ni bdag dang /
T02D1801:43a-8: byed pa po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin ma yin no //
T02D1801:43a-10: de dag la bya ba'i mtshan nyid can yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1801:43a-11: de nyid kyi phyir bdag la sogs pa'i dngos po yod pa ma yin na /
T02D1801:43a-12: sems de'i rang bzhin du gyur pa lta ga la yod ces smras par 'gyur ro //
T02D1801:43a-13: de'i phyir dngos po thams cad dang bral zhing bdag
T02D1801:43a-14: tu 'dzin pa tsam gyis yang dag par bskyed pa'o
T02D1801:43a-15: // nyon mongs pa thams cad bdag tu 'dzin pas
T02D1801:43a-16: yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir sems ni de'i rang
T02D1801:43a-18: sems de ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir /
T02D1801:43a-19: phung po khams dang skye mched dang //
T02D1801:43a-20: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs //
T02D1801:43a-22: 'di ltar re zhig phung po la sogs pa nyid kyi dngos po don dam par ma dmigs na /
T02D1801:43a-23: sems de'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ba lta ga la yod /
T02D1801:43a-25: re zhig gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po rnams dngos po med pa nyid de /
T02D1801:43a-26: gzugs kyi phung po ni 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur ba'i tshogs so //
T02D1801:43a-32: 'byung ba las gyur pa lnga ste /
T02D1801:43a-38: sa la sogs pa 'byung ba rnams dang /
T02D1801:43a-39: gzugs la sogs pa 'byung ba las gyur pa de
T02D1801:43a-40: dag re re zhing tha dad pa'i dngos po nyid
T02D1801:43a-42: gang du gcig tu yod pa der gzhan yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1801:43a-43: de'i phyir gzugs ni ming tsam du kun du brtags pa'o //
T02D1801:43a-44: gzugs kyi phung po ni gzugs kyi phung pos stong
T02D1801:43a-45: zhes gsungs pa las ni gzugs kyi phung po yang
T02D1801:43a-47: de bzhin du tshor ba'i phung po yongs su ma grub ste /
T02D1801:43a-49: tshor ba rnam pa gsum mo //
T02D1801:43a-52: sdug bsngal ma yin zhing bde ba yang ma yin pa de dag phan tshun ltos pa'i phyir te /
T02D1801:43a-53: sdug bsngal la ltos nas bde ba dang /
T02D1801:43a-54: bde ba la ltos nas sdug bsngal du 'dogs par byed do //
T02D1801:43b-0: chos gang zhig gcig pur gnas pa dmigs @43b pa
T02D1801:43b-1: med pa de ni rdzas nyid du yod pa yin
T02D1801:43b-2: te / ring po dang thung du bzhin no //
T02D1801:43b-3: gzhan du tshor ba ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D1801:43b-5: sems las byung ba'o zhes par yang re zhig lus
T02D1801:43b-6: ni gzugs kyi phung pos bsdus pa'i phyir ma dmigs
T02D1801:43b-7: so // de'i phyir lus med pa'i phyir lus las byung ba'i tshor ba ma grub bo //
T02D1801:43b-8: sems kyang yul na mi gnas pa /
T02D1801:43b-14: rnam par mi rig par gsungs na /
T02D1801:43b-15: tshor ba de ni ci 'dra zhig de'i phyir sems las byung ba yang ma grub po //
T02D1801:43b-16: de'i phyir tshor ba'i phung po ni tshor ba'i phung pos stong po zhes gsungs pa las na /
T02D1801:43b-17: tshor ba'i phung po yang yongs su ma grub po //
T02D1801:43b-18: 'du shes kyi phung po yang ming tsam gyis dngos po nyid de /
T02D1801:43b-19: 'du shes ni mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid can yin la /
T02D1801:43b-20: de ltar re zhig gang dag la mtshan mar gzung
T02D1801:43b-21: bar bya ba'i dngos po yod pa ma yin pa
T02D1801:43b-22: de'i phyir mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma can yang
T02D1801:43b-24: 'du shes kyi phung po ni 'du shes kyi yung
T02D1801:43b-25: bos stong ngo zhes gsungs pa las na 'du shes
T02D1801:43b-26: kyi phung po yang yongs su ma grub bo //
T02D1801:43b-27: 'du byed kyi phung po yang yongs su ma grub ste tshogs pa tsam gyi phyir ro ;
T02D1801:43b-28: /'du byed kyi phung po ni tshor ba dang /
T02D1801:43b-29: sems pa dang 'du shes dang 'dun pa dang reg pa dang blo dang /
T02D1801:43b-30: dran pa dang yid la byed pa dang mos pa la sogs pa mtshungs par ldan pa rnams dang /
T02D1801:43b-31: sa dang chu dang med dang rlung la sogs pa'i
T02D1801:43b-32: skye ba la sogs pa mtshungs par mi ldan pa
T02D1801:43b-34: sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang skye ba la
T02D1801:43b-35: sogs pa dag kyang re re zhing la skye ba
T02D1801:43b-37: 'du byed kyi phung po ni las kyi mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir yang med pa nyid do //
T02D1801:43b-38: byed pa po med pa'i phyir bya ba yang dngos po med do //
T02D1801:43b-39: 'du byed kyi phung po ni 'du byed kyi phung
T02D1801:43b-40: po'i dngos pos stong ngo zhes gsungs pa las na
T02D1801:43b-41: 'du byed kyi phung po yongs su grub pa med
T02D1801:43b-42: do // rnam par shes pa'i phung po yang yongs su ma grub ste /
T02D1801:43b-43: 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i phung po nyid ni mig dang /
T02D1801:43b-48: yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnams yin la /
T02D1801:44a-0: @44a * // mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa de
T02D1801:44a-1: dag kyang re re zhing rang gi ngo bo ma
T02D1801:44a-2: dmigs so // ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D1801:44a-3: mig dang gzugs la brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung zhing med na mi 'byung ste /
T02D1801:44a-4: mig dang gzugs med na mig gi rnam par shes pa ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur /
T02D1801:44a-5: de ltar na re zhig mig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma grub po //
T02D1801:44a-6: tshig de nyid kyis rna ba dang /
T02D1801:44a-8: lce dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang yid
T02D1801:44a-9: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i chos thams cad kyi
T02D1801:44a-11: ci ltar 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams
T02D1801:44a-12: yid kyi rnam par shes pa skyed pa'i rkyen du
T02D1801:44a-13: 'gyur / bcom ldan 'das kyis re zhig 'das pa ni de nyid dang /
T02D1801:44a-14: lhan cig 'gags shing ma 'ongs pa ni ma thob pa yin la /
T02D1801:44a-15: da ltar byung ba rnam par shes pa dang lhan
T02D1801:44a-16: cig pa yang gnas pa yod pa ma yin zhes
T02D1801:44a-17: gsungs so // rnam par shes pa'i phung po yang
T02D1801:44a-18: rnam par shes pa'i phung pos stong ngo zhes pa
T02D1801:44a-19: las rnam par shes pa'i phung po yang yongs su
T02D1801:44a-20: gsungs so // ma grub bo // de ltar phung
T02D1801:44a-21: po de nyid khams dang skye mched du bstan pa'i
T02D1801:44a-22: phyir logs su dgag par mi bya ste /
T02D1801:44a-23: sa bon med pas myu gu med pa bzhin du
T02D1801:44a-24: phung po rang bzhin med pa nyid kyis de rnams
T02D1801:44a-25: kyang rang bzhin med par grub bo //
T02D1801:44a-26: de'i phyir sems ni phung po dang /
T02D1801:44a-28: skye mched dang bral ba zhes bya'o //
T02D1801:44a-29: gzung dang 'dzin ba rnam par spangs //
T02D1801:44a-30: zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
T02D1801:44a-31: rgyas kyis deng zhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i mdo las
T02D1801:44a-42: gru bzhi la sogs pa'i rnam pa dang /
T02D1801:44a-43: skyes pa dang bud med dang /
T02D1801:44a-44: ma ning gi rnam pa ma mthong ngo zhes pa dang /
T02D1801:44a-45: gsang ba'i bdag po sems ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ma yin /
T02D1801:44a-46: gzugs kyi khams kyi rang bzhin ma yin /
T02D1801:44a-47: gzugs med pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ma yin /
T02D1801:44b-0: mi dang mi ma yin pa'i @44b 'gro ba'i rang bzhin ma yin no zhes pa nas /
T02D1801:44b-1: rnam pa thams cad du yongs su btsal na ma dmigs so zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs so //
T02D1801:44b-2: de ltar na re zhig sems de ni gzung ba ma yin no //
T02D1801:44b-3: ji ltar 'dzin pa yang ma yin pa de ltar brjod par bya ste /
T02D1801:44b-4: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i bdag po
T02D1801:44b-5: sems de ni nang na yang ma yin phyi rol
T02D1801:44b-7: gnyis ka'i bar du yang ma yin no //
T02D1801:44b-9: gsang ba'i bdag po sems de ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1801:44b-10: de'i phyir gang rnam pa thams cad kyis yongs su
T02D1801:44b-11: btsal na ma dmigs pa de ji ltar gzung ba
T02D1801:44b-13: de ltar na sems de ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba zhes bya'o //
T02D1801:44b-14: chos bdag med par mnyam nyid pas //
T02D1801:44b-15: zhes bya ba ni phung po la sogs pa thams
T02D1801:44b-16: cad bdag med pa de bzhin du sems de yang
T02D1801:44b-17: ngo // de skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis chos
T02D1801:44b-18: thams cad stong pa de bzhin du sems kyang stong
T02D1801:44b-20: chos thams cad bdag med pa de bzhin du sems de yang bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1801:44b-21: chos thams cad rnam par dben pa ste /
T02D1801:44b-22: de bzhin du sems de yang rnam par dben pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1801:44b-23: de'i phyir chos bdag med par mnyam pa nyid kyis
T02D1801:44b-24: sems de mnyam pa yin pa'i phyir rang gi sems
T02D1801:44b-25: gdod ma nas ma skyes pa'o //
T02D1801:44b-26: de'i phyir stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1801:44b-27: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ci zhe na /
T02D1801:44b-28: stong pa nyid ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1801:44b-29: de skad du'ang nam mkha' stong pa'o //
T02D1801:44b-30: chos thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1801:44b-31: byang chub kyang de'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1801:44b-32: sems kyang de'i rang bzhin no zhes gsungs so //
T02D1801:44b-33: de bzhin du nam mkha' rang bzhin med pa ming tsam mo //
T02D1801:44b-34: de bzhin du sems kyang rang bzhin med pa ming tsam yin /
T02D1801:44b-35: gang yang sems ma skyes ma 'gags par khong du chud pa de ni byang chub bo //
T02D1801:44b-36: de skad du yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub gang zhe na /
T02D1801:44b-37: gang sems kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin yongs su shes pa ste /
T02D1801:44b-38: de nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
T02D1801:44b-39: gsang ba'i bdag po chos phra ba yang yod pa
T02D1801:44b-40: ma yin zhing dmigs pa med pa des na bla
T02D1801:45a-0: na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @45a *
T02D1801:45a-3: byang chub ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de /
T02D1801:45a-4: rtogs pa po dang rtogs par bya ba 'ga' yang med do //
T02D1801:45a-6: byang chub ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir ro zhes gsungs so //
T02D1801:45a-7: de'i phyir gang zhig rang gi sems yang dag pa
T02D1801:45a-8: ji lta ba bzhin rig pa de la brtse ba'i
T02D1801:45a-9: thabs kyis / kye ma kyi hud sems can 'di dag ni sdug bsngal sna /
T02D1801:45a-10: 'di dag ni rang gi sems kyi chos nyid kyi
T02D1801:45a-11: rang bzhin ma gtogs pa yang dag pa ma yin
T02D1801:45a-12: pa'i rnam par rtog pa phyin ci log gi gdon
T02D1801:45a-13: gyis bzung ba / 'khor ba na sdug bsngal sna tshogs nyams su myong ba yin zhing /
T02D1801:45a-14: ji ltar de dag rang gi sems kyi chos nyid
T02D1801:45a-15: kyi rang bzhin rtogs par 'gyur ba de bzhin du
T02D1801:45a-16: bdag gis 'bad par bya'o zhes sems can la dmigs
T02D1801:45a-18: gang snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung ba'i sems bskyed ba de ni byang chub kyi sems dang /
T02D1801:45a-19: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sems dang /
T02D1801:45a-20: sems can thams cad la bde ba'i sems dang /
T02D1801:45a-21: bla na med pa'i sems dang /
T02D1801:45a-22: chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa'i sems dang /
T02D1801:45a-23: sems can thams cad la brten nas skyes pa'i byang chub kyi sems zhes bya'o //
T02D1801:45a-24: byang chub sems kyi 'grel pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1801:45a-26: // / kha che'i pandi ta dza ya aa nanta dang /
